<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.getAvailableUIPolicyViews</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Returns an array of Sys IDs that indicate which UI Views a UI Policy should have access to.
This is used in a Dynamic Filter Option for the sys_ui_policy.view dynamic reference qualifier.</description>
        <name>getAvailableUIPolicyViews</name>
        <script><![CDATA[// policyTableName is the name of the table the UI Policy
// applies to
function getAvailableUIPolicyViews(policyTableName) {
	var views = {};
	['sys_ui_form', 'sys_ui_section'].forEach(function(tableName) {
		var ga = new GlideAggregate(tableName);
		ga.addQuery('view', '!=', 'Default view');
		ga.addQuery('name', policyTableName);
		ga.addAggregate('COUNT');
		ga.groupBy('view');
		ga.query();
		while (ga.next())
			views[ga.getValue('view')] = 1;
	});
	return Object.keys(views);
}]]></script>
